import { Grid, Select, MenuItem, TextField, InputLabel, FormControl, } from "@mui/material"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const CheckoutForm = ({ user = {}, orderInfo, handleChange, handleSubmit, checkoutData, handleSelectChange, }) => (
Shipping Country Shipping Subdivision Shipping Options
Go Back
); export default CheckoutForm;
